alert.note: Alert for Polk; San Jacinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 9:09PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central San Jacinto and southwestern Polk Counties through 1000 PM CST... At 909 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Coldspring, or 13 miles west of Livingston, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Onalaska, Coldspring, Point Blank, Lake Livingston State Park, West Livingston and Leggett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
